org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

Class MinkowskiSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase.MinkowskiSum

  • public class MinkowskiSum
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Minkowski sum of the given Convex Shapes.

    This class is used by the Gjk and Epa classes.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MinkowskiSum.Point
      Represents a point in the MinkowskiSum.
